references: Gardner, M. ``The Binary Gray Code.'' Ch. 2 in Knotted Doughnuts and Other Mathematical Entertainments. New York: W. H. Freeman, 1986.
C. A. Pickover, The Math Book, Sterling, NY, 2009; see p. 392.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Gray Code
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<2, n,      (b-> 10^b +a(2^(b+1)-1-n))(ilog2(n)))    end:seq(a(n), n=0..50);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 01 2008
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = (b = Floor[Log[2, n]]; If[n <= 1, n, 10^b + a[2^(b + 1) - 1 - n]]); Table[a[n], {n, 0, 36}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 11 2012, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (Larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 05 2000
